item.title: Report X-2024100912
item.description:
Report X-2024100912

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-17T09:14:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-18
  • City: OREM
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO CLERKS FROM PACKAGE OPENING ON SORT AISLE. UPON CHECKING THE PACKAGE THERE WAS FOUND TO BE A GROUND LIMITED QUANITY MARK ON THE INSIDE OF THE PACKAGE ON AN ADDITIONAL BOX THAT HAD DOVE BODY SPRAY, AEROSOLS.
